name: Roadtoad
overview: Created by Corkey Wood and published both by Nibbles & Bits, Inc. and in 75 Spill Datatronic also known as Super Frog, this Frogger style game, unlike many others, even those with very similar names, has three avoidance areas, first the regular interstate of cars, trucks and trailers, then a section where you must avoid the aliens and bugs before getting through the traditional logs, lily-pads and crocs.
